title: League Friends for Middle East IOS

replies.body:
Hey there,

I see your account is on EUNE, the app is currently only live on the NA and OCE regions for now and Riot is working to roll it out to other regions soon.

When you say the app isn't available on "Middle east iOS" do you mean you are unable to locate the app on the app store?
Here is a direct link to the app, please let me know if you're able to access it, or if not what error you're receiving.
https://itunes.apple.com/au/app/league-friends/id1077150310?mt=8
